channel.title: CVE Feed for Fedora -- Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fedora -- Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux

item.title: CVE-2022-4132|2024-08-03T01:27:54.494Z -- fedora -- extra%20packages%20for%20enterprise%20linux
item.description: A flaw was found in JSS. A memory leak in JSS requires non-standard configuration but is a low-effort DoS vector if configured that way (repeatedly hitting the login page).
